prompt: Delete the last entry 'Proficient in using PS/AI' in the 'Skill Certificate' section.
knowledge_prompt: Each entry in the 'Skills Certificates' section consists of a bullet point and its corresponding text, which together form a separate list item. When the last entry is deleted, the text 'Proficient in PS/AI' and the solid bullet point preceding it should be treated as a single unit to maintain consistent formatting and list structure.
